title: Fragments, 13th century
medium: Medium: silk; gilded goldbeaters' skin wound around a silk core
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Erskine Hewitt
description: Eight-pointed stars enclosing rampant addorsed lions, heads turned toward each other; the pointed-armed crosses forming the interstices are filled with symmetrical foliate arabesques. The pattern appears slightly raised in gold on blue and pink ground.  Fragment from a set of vestments from the Cathedral of Lérida, Spain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 13th century.
13th century. Medium: silk; gilded goldbeaters' skin wound around a silk core. Museum purchase through gift of Erskine Hewitt. 1943-20-1-a,b.
